content: this step with the following * chain 2 double_crochet 4 chain 2 slip_stitch into next 3 st chain 2 double_crochet 12 tc 2 tcinc next 3 st 11 now work on the diameter of the semicircle chain 1 slip_stitch 4 single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet 7 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 finish finish with a long tail i find it easy to use the tc stitches as a chain the pink part of the ears make two 1 chain 4 2 chain 1 single_crochet 1 increase 1 3 chain 1 single_crochet 2 increase 1 4 chain 1 single_crochet 3 increase 1 5 chain 1 single_crochet 4 increase 1 6 chain 1 single_crochet 5 increase 1 finish sew onto the aqua ear pieces with some aqua yarn don t use the yarn from finishing the aqua ear piece though you are going to use that yarn tail to sew the finished ears onto the body feet make two 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 slip_stitch together 2 increase entire round 3-7 single_crochet next 5 rounds slip_stitch end of 7th round finish with a long tail sew onto the body hands make two 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 slip_stitch together 2 increase entire round 3-5 single_crochet next 3 rounds slip_stitch end or 5th round finish with a long tail sew onto the body tail 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 slip_stitch together 2 single_crochet entire round 3 single_crochet 1 increase 1 slip_stitch 4-9 single_crochet next 6 rounds slip_stitch end of 9th round 10 single_crochet 1 decrease 1 slip_stitch finish with a long tail sew this onto his rear end this is a crucial part of his balance when sitting up if you are not using any kind of weights hopefully it turned out well for you if you have any suggestions or concerns about this pattern such as the ears let me know in the comments on the page where the pattern came from happy 33rd anniversary kirby april 27 2025 -0u0-
